topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
That's it!
I give up! I fucking give up!

The examiner failed me in my driver's test on something so minuscule. *Twice.* I can accept failure on my own terms but on something that isn't my fault? I will not stand for that. And after I signed some stupid papers and slammed the pen a little, he fucking got angry at me and insulted me. He went "Accept the facts, kid. You failed." in a harsh tone. He insulted me before that, something like "You have the nerve to get angry, kid?! What gives you the right to get mad at me for your failure?!", which wasn't my fault. He was triggered so easily...

I mean, I could easily pass that one obstacle but I twitched a little and I failed. Well, fuck you examiner. 

Fuck you.

Now excuse me as I rant about it in my room, reflect on my actions by looking at a mirror and cry with a pillow in my face.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
